name: Slumberfish
description: In Slumberfish your goal is to use the sleeping critters of the sea to knock a red ball to it's goal! You'll make use of fish, jellyfish, starfish, whirlpools, ocean currents, seahorses, turtles and pufferfish in 35 levels of underwater excitement! Add to that three difficulty settings, and Slumberfish is sure to reel you back in over and over again!
